dateTimeToString

public static java.lang.String dateTimeToString(java.util.Date d)

removeFormatSpecifierFromUriPath

public static java.lang.String removeFormatSpecifierFromUriPath(java.lang.String path)
Removes ".xml", ".json" or ".html" format specifiers from the given path, e.g. "/resources.json/loggfiles.xml/test.bin" becomes "/resources/loggfiles/test.bin"

Parameters:
path - A path string with a arbritrary numbers of format specifiers; ".json", ".xml" or ".html"
Returns:
returns The path with the format specifiers removed.

retrieveFormatSpecifierFromUriPath

public static java.lang.String retrieveFormatSpecifierFromUriPath(java.lang.String path)

removeFormatSpecifierFromUri

public static java.net.URI removeFormatSpecifierFromUri(java.net.URI uri)
Removes ".xml", ".json" or ".html" format specifiers from the given uri, e.g. "http://www.ksu.se/resources.json/loggfiles.xml/test.bin" becomes "http://www.ksu.se/resources/loggfiles/test.bin"

Parameters:
usi - A usi string with a arbritrary numbers of format specifiers; ".json", ".xml" or ".html"
Returns:
returns The usi with the format specifiers removed.

retrieveFormatSpecifierFromUri

public static java.lang.String retrieveFormatSpecifierFromUri(java.net.URI uri)
